text: Facundo Mallo Blanco (born 16 January 1995) is a Uruguayan professional footballer who last played for Rapid București as a defender. ==Honours== ;Liverpool Montevideo *Segunda División Uruguay: 2014–15 ;CA Torque *Segunda División Uruguay: 2017 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:People from Montevideo Category:Uruguayan footballers Category:Uruguay youth international footballers Category:Uruguay under-20 international footballers Category:Uruguayan Primera División players Category:Liga I players Category:Liverpool F.C. title: Facundo Mallo
